attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A Party produces a manifesto to display its policies but too often now voters decide on a party and their accompanying policies only for these promises to be broken without any public consultation. If a party wishes to go against a promise it has made then a significant attempt must be made to consult with the public and in many cases a referendum should take place.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
